So at one point i had paid the ten bucks and registered for the 
original gladiator, but i lost the disk for it.  I really want to 
play it.  Since the FS website is down i can't redownload it.  Can 
someone help me get the registered version?  This would be 
completely moral because i've already paid for it a long time ago.
